name: 'Coffee Icebreaker'
description: 'Let us get together to explore the cafes where everyone feels at ease to just enjoy good food good coffee and good company.'

name: 'Laser Tag'
description: 'Looking for an exhilarating adventure? Get ready and join us for a session of laser tag. Navigate through a maze build up your team bonding or simply just have a shootout for an exciting experience.'

name: 'Cooking Class + Potluck Party'
description: 'Come and learn from the experienced chefs. Each cooking class will have different theme and it would be a great session to cook eat and share the love of cooking or eating.'

name: 'Chinatown Walking Trails'
description: 'Come and join us for a healthy game of basketball where sweat fun and laughter meet.'
